title: SkypeSetup_6.14.0.104
description:
SkypeSetup_6.14.0.104


                        How to disable persistent backdoor skype updater





1 -  Go to " C:WindowsSystem32driversetc "

2 -  open hosts file with notepad

3 -  add " 127.0.0.1       download.skype.com " to list

4 -  save file without extention
 
5 -  restart computer

6 -  uninstall current skype

7 -  go to " %temp% "

8 -  go to " 

9 -  delete everything skype related

10 - got to C:Users(your username)AppDataRoaming

11 - delete everything skype related

12 - restart

13 - install version of skype included in torrent

14 - log in

15 - quickly go to tools-options-advanced-automatic updates

16 - disable automatic updates and save

17 - go to start-run type msconfig enter

18 - go to dervices and untick skype updater

19 - click apply and ok

20 - restart


Enjoy
